articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Stalkers beware! Google just launched new tracking feature over AirTag misuse - HT Tech
articles.description: Google introduces a safety feature to alert Android users about potential stalking risks from unfamiliar Bluetooth trackers like AirTags.
articles.content: In a bid to enhance user safety, Google recently unveiled an innovative feature aimed at alerting Android users about potential stalking threats posed by unfamiliar Bluetooth trackers, particularly A… [+2854 chars]
